featured.text: To stay in Penghu and do some fishing.
Near the “black ditch” of Penghu, battered by winds of up to 70 knots, the rear sail was torn into shreds.
Which course (direction) did the Vladimirs take to get to Penghu? (A) East.
It is not immediately known whether the “Kawasaki” can be repaired on the fishing island of Penghu, or when the Vladimirs will be able to set off again and continue their around-the-world voyage.
Surprised by the father and son’s “pale faces” and their battered vessel, the Penghu police and fishers in Paisha rescued them.

definition.zh_def: 澎湖，位於台灣海峽中的一組島嶼，以其美麗的海灘和豐富的海洋生態而聞名。
definition.en_def: Penghu, an archipelago located in the Taiwan Strait, known for its beautiful beaches and rich marine ecology.
definition.example: We are planning a trip to Penghu to enjoy the stunning coastal scenery.
